item.title: ECTHR submissions
item.description: Before I publish more, I first need to redact more information from what was submitted to the European Court of Human Rights since the Courtâ€™s records pertaining to this case, V.L.C. v. France (50552/22) have been sealed. (1) General Introduction (2) Dear Honorable Judges of the European Court of Human Rights, (3) I request the permission to file my application, including the request for interim measures and any subsequent legal proceedings, in the English language. This request is predicated on specific considerations pertinent to the case at hand.
